trans-unit.source: Stores a set of <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> types.
The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformationCollection.Item%2A> property returns a member of the collection.
The object to be added to the collection.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> because this operation is not supported for this collection.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> because this operation is not supported for this collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> object to be searched in the collection.
Checks whether the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> object exists in the collection; otherwise.
<see langword="false" />.
A one-dimensional array that receives a copy of the collection.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which the copy begins.
Copies the collection to the specified array.
The `array` parameter must be one-dimensional with zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: `array`參數必須是一維以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="offset" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in this <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="offset" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
The elements in this <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> types in this collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that contains the number of <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> types in this collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />值，包含的數字<see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" />此集合中的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that can be used to iterate through this collection.

An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface and provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> types in this collection.
The object that is returned by this method is initially positioned before the first element in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的物件一開始位於此集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method before you can access the first element.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，才能存取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: To access the element at the current position, call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取目前位置的項目，呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not modify the collection while using the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 請勿修改時使用的列舉值集合。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified while an enumerator is in use, an attempt to set the position by calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果列舉值時，會修改集合使用，請嘗試將位置設定藉由呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of enumerators, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> class and the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的詳細說明，請參閱文件<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>類別和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to this collection is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
The zero-based index of the element.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> at the specified index in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> at the specified location.
The object to be removed.
Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" /> because this operation is not supported for this collection.
Always throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
Returns an object that can be used to iterate through this collection.

An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface and provides access to the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPAddressInformation" /> types in this collection.
The object that is returned by this method is initially positioned before the first element in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所傳回的物件一開始位於此集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method before you can access the first element.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，才能存取第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: To access the element at the current position, call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取目前位置的項目，呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not modify the collection while using the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 請勿修改時使用的列舉值集合。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified while an enumerator is in use, an attempt to set the position by calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果列舉值時，會修改集合使用，請嘗試將位置設定藉由呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of enumerators, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> class and the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的詳細說明，請參閱文件<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>類別和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。
